title: Day 367
content:
# Day 367

This meme could be quite helpful for future you anon.

<iframe src="https://cdn.embedly.com/widgets/media.html?type=text%2Fhtml&key=a19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07&schema=twitter&url=https%3A//twitter.com/ConorChepenik/status/1639424725611864071%3Fs%3D20&image=https%3A//i.embed.ly/1/image%3Furl%3Dhttps%253A%252F%252Fabs.twimg.com%252Ferrors%252Flogo46x38.png%26key%3Da19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07" title="" height="281" width="500"></iframe>

Going to post it on Nostr and stack some sats. It feels exciting getting paid to shitpost. The features that will come in the following decades from the combo of Bitcoin and Nostr are going to blow minds.

> [**More Markets, Less Regulators**](https://bitcoinnews.com/more-markets-please/)

Had this article get released by Bitcoin News today which I was excited about. Been too long. Got another one coming on the 26th with Bitcoin Magazine. It's about home birth and bitcoin. Somehow found a way to relate those two topicsðŸ˜‚

Anyways, I am happy to report I passed my systems check at the coding bootcamp which means I'm on pace to get access to hiring partners at the end of the bootcamp. Feels good passing a test I was worried about.

I'll end this by pointing out the Youtube comments section does not miss.

<iframe src="https://cdn.embedly.com/widgets/media.html?src=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fembed%2FXSh9-txcEHs%3Ffeature%3Doembed&display_name=YouTube&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DXSh9-txcEHs&image=https%3A%2F%2Fi.ytimg.com%2Fvi%2FXSh9-txcEHs%2Fhqdefault.jpg&key=a19fcc184b9711e1b4764040d3dc5c07&type=text%2Fhtml&schema=youtube" title="" height="480" width="854"></iframe>

![](https://miro.medium.com/1*qWTyNwWxhtYCC7IMcODoSw.png)

p.s *notes for myself* make a list about what to add in your Nostr powerpoint, make a Nostr video, and send out a podcast invite.

3/24/23

Conor Jay Chepenik
